propDescriptions.area: Set to true to fill spark line area. Has no effect if plotType='bar'.
propDescriptions.colors: Color palette used to colorize multiple series.
propDescriptions.showHighlight: Set to true to highlight the value. With line, it shows a point. With bar, it shows a highlight band.
propDescriptions.showTooltip: Set to true to enable the tooltip in the sparkline.
propDescriptions.valueFormatter:
Formatter used by the tooltip.

Signature:
function(value: number) => string
value: The value to format.
returns (string): the formatted value.
propDescriptions.xAxis: The xAxis configuration. Notice it is a single configuration object, not an array of configuration.
